title: Trying to "open with" a highlight file freezes Windows Explorer
body: My default player for webm files is vlc media player and opening the highlight normally works fine. However I want to make the webm into a gif so I can share it with my friends. When I right click the file and hover over "Open with", windows explorer and the little popup dialogue just freeze. I can still move my mouse and interact with other screens but the dialogue stays on top of everything and doesn't go away. If I try to restart explorer.exe via task manager it closes but doesn't restart like it normally does. So any time this happens I have to restart my entire computer. I'm running Windows 10 and haven't ever had this issue before, any ideas?

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like something is going a little wonky with your pc if those menus are freezing and sticking around when they shouldn't. I'm honestly not 100% sure what could be making that happen, but go ahead and hit up our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may be able to figure that out for ya!
